subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tom Kite shot a six-under 65 to move into a tie for the lead with Mark O’Meara after the second round of the Champions Tour’s AT&T Championship in San Antonio. O’Meara, the first-round leader after a 63, shot a 68 to match Kite at 11 under.
